source.945c7e33:
## The output of this kernel can be directly used in the kernel you will be making. This notebook is generating output folder with data being segregated into different class categories. This is helpful as many frameworks like PyTorch & Tensorflow support DataLoaders & Datasets with data separated in different classes.

PS:- The notebook is regularly updated by re-run of the kernel. For the changes to reflect in your model notebook, all you will need to do is re-run your own notebook.
